help_about_items.learn: If you want to learn more about this Identity Manager and how to use it, take a look at the links below:
help_about_items.installing: Complete documentation for installing, administrating and using the Identity Manager in ReadTheDocs
help_about_items.source: Source code of the project in GitHub
help_about_items.missed_tours: Missed one of the tours? Want to take them again? This is the complete list of tours that will guide you from the basics of this Identity Manager to some of the most advanced features.
help_about_items.basic_tour: Basics Tour: get to know the Welcome page.
help_about_items.profile_tour: Profile Tour: edit your personal data and set up an avatar.
help_about_items.app_tour: Applications Tour: create your first application.
help_about_items.roles_tour: Roles & Permissions Tour: learn more about roles and permissions inside apps, and how to authorize other users and organizations in them.
help_about_items.organizations_tour: Organizations Tour: create your first organization and take a look at its home page.

login.title: Log In
login.alert02: Password changed. Please log in again to continue.

presentation.title: Identity Manager
presentation.subtitle01: Welcome to an implementation of FIWARE Identity Manager developed by DIT-UPM.
presentation.subtitle02: You can customize this login page as well as any other style/layout in this web service. Check customization documentation to learn how to do it!

pass_request.title: Forgot your password?
pass_request.content: Write down the email address you associated to your account and you will receive an email with instructions about how to reset your password in a few minutes
pass_request.label: Email

pass_reset.title: Change your password
pass_reset.alert: New password and confirm password not match.

settings.title: Settings
settings.content02: We highly recommend you enable it, since it provides a higher level of security to access your account.
settings.content03: If you want to give two factor authentication a try, you need to provide a security question, just in case you happen to lose access to your authentication app.

delete_user.title: Cancel account
delete_user.content: Are you sure? Cancelling your account implies the deletion of all your resources. This action is permanent.

change_pass.title: Change Password
change_pass.pass_alert: New password and confirm password not match.

warn_change_pass.title: Change password
warn_change_pass.content: It's been a year since you changed the password. For security reasons and to continue using this portal, please change it.

delete_avatar.confirmation_msg: Are you sure you want to delete this image?
delete_avatar.upload_msg: You can upload it again whenever you want.

edit_user.gravatar_link: We're compatible with Gravatar. Create your profile
edit_user.select_img: Select the part of the image you want to use as avatar.

new_user.pass_error: The two password fields didn't match
new_user.have_gravatar: I have Gravatar and want to use it for my avatar.

show_user.no_member_warning: You are not member or owner of any organizations.
show_user.no_authorized_warning: You are not authorized in any application.

notify.subject: Subject
notify.write_user_ids_message: Need to write some user ids

authorize_pop_up.title: Manage Administrators
authorize_pop_up.use_filter_message: Use the filter (type at least two characters).
authorize_pop_up.no_role_assigned_message: Some users don't have any role assigned. If you save now they won't be authorized in the application

create_pop_up.title: Create user
create_pop_up.password_not_match: The two password fields didn't match.
create_pop_up.send_user_email_input: Send an email to the user
create_pop_up.send_user_email_popover: This will send an email to the user including the assigned password.

delete_pop_up.title: Delete user
delete_pop_up.message_1: You are going to delete these users:
delete_pop_up.message_2: Are you sure? Deleting users implies the deletion of all their resources. This action is permanent.

reset_pass_pop_up.title: Change password
reset_pass_pop_up.password_not_match: The two password fields didn't match.
